com.facebook.buck.rules.macros

Class EnvironmentVariableMacroExpander

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.rules.macros.EnvironmentVariableMacroExpander
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MacroExpander

    public class EnvironmentVariableMacroExpander
extends java.lang.Object
implements MacroExpander
    Expands $(env XYZ) to use the appropriate shell expansion for the current platform. It does not expand the value of the environment variable in place. Rather, the intention is for the variable to be interpreted when a shell command is invoked.
